account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the transcription data.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API used for the transcription.

date_created.description: The date and time when the transcription was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the transcription was last updated.

duration.description: The duration of the audio recording for which the transcription was generated.

price.description: The cost of the transcription service.

price_unit.description: The currency unit used for pricing the transcription service.

recording_sid.description: The unique identifier for the recording associated with the transcription.

sid.description: The unique identifier for the transcription data.

status.description: The current status of the transcription (e.g., in-progress, completed).

transcription_text.description: The text content of the transcription generated from the audio recording.

type.description: The type of transcription (e.g., automatic, human-generated).

uri.description: The URI where the transcription data can be accessed.
